column4: hi, though I have added the backports repos to sources.list, i can't find the sun-j2re1.5 package there
can someone let me know what i am doing wrong?
backports has problems
is this temporary, or are we in for a long run of problems?
sudo -i is shorter ;)
how dd yo do the smiley?
like this:
yeah, you've done that to me before
rightclick on the url, select open in browser
i would like it to just open on a left click - is that possible, even?
no idea
Ctrl+Click does it :)
file a bug - it could be a bad initramfs
do you have /boot on a separate partition?
yes. I have a seperate partition for /boot - does this mean anything? And could help me with submitting the bugreport - what details should I include?
check whether that partition is full
on the contrary it has 201.65 MB free. Only about 80MB is used now.
hmm...
i am now booted in, without hotplug etc on that laptop. Are there any logs etc that I can use for  my bug report for the latest kernel boot issue (or are they lost now?)
they most likely aren't logged since it couldn't find the root disk - I suggest you file a bug
in package initramfs ?
